chart_description: The `nginxplus.resolver_zone_responses_rate` chart measures the rate of DNS resolver responses per second by status code (noerror, nxdomain, refused) for the nginxplus server.

dimension_descriptions.noerror: The rate of successful (no error) DNS resolver responses per second.
dimension_descriptions.nxdomain: The rate of response for non-existent domain (nxdomain) DNS queries per second.
dimension_descriptions.refused: The rate of refused DNS resolver responses per second.
